items.details:
Upcoming Tests
Tuesday Januart 20th - Grammar Worshop - Unit 3 (Verbs)
Thursday January 22nd - Math Topic 8
Friday January 23rd - Vocabulary Workshop Unit 1-9

Reading

Complete 44-45 in the my view book.

Complete the definition paper (WEDNESDAY)

Please watch the video of this weeks story.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c1ltLnSAaT4

Prepare for the spelling test next Friday

Please make sure students log in to ReadWorks and complete the assigned stories. New passages have been added, including one on the Titanic and another on the three branches of government, which link closely to our class learning.
Students should also read their library books and complete the AR quizzes once finished.

ReadWorks login:

www.readworks.org/student

Class code: YU6GQ2

Password: [REDACTED] (unless already changed)

Math

Complete Additional Practice 8-8 student book and homework book.

I have added New Khan Academy lessons related to data.

Please have your child practice a little Khan Academy math each night
 at https://www.khanacademy.org/join/VK6QDS9E to help strengthen their skills.

Language Arts (DUE TUESDAY)

Complete pages 114-117 in the Grammar Workshop Book.

Social Studies

Complete the cut and paste worksheet for levels of government
Read and complete pages 

Complete the Readworks story about branches of government.

Watch the videos about symbols and landmarks of USA

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CJLGw0lkcdE
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t4ED9ytXPm4
